question: Which Britain tennis player has been given a wildcard to French Open 2020?
explanation:
Britain's Andy Murray who is former world number has been given a wildcard entry into the main draw of French Open.
This year's French Open first round begins on 27th September. Murray is a three-time Grand Slam winner and a French Open finalist. He has not appeared at the event since 2017, when he lost to Stan Wawrinka.
